short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better usability and speed-controls for LMUCast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The LMU's digital video platform, LMUCast is lacking some features, I consider to be crucial to the online-learning experience, like watching the videos at the intended, aka 3x speed.
I had some time on my hands, so I decided to change that, and while I was at it, I also gave it a small styling overhaul.

You can check out the source code on the github page: https://github.com/meinlebenswerk/LMUCast-
